channel.title: News Reports on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in News Reports on TechnoStreet

item.title: China harbouring a dream of becoming a ‘great maritime power’: Report
item.description: China harbouring a dream of becoming a ‘great maritime power’: Report Since its 18th party of CCP in 2012, China has laid down the vision of transforming itself into a ‘great maritime power’.

item.title: Amazon begins layoffs in India, informs affected employees over email and promises them 5 months of severance pay
item.description: Amazon begins layoffs in India, informs affected employees over email and promises them 5 months of severance pay Amazon CEO Andy Jassy had earlier announced that the e-commerce giant will lay off over 18,000 employees.

item.title: Amazon to layoff over 18,000 employees, had fired 10,000 in November 2022
item.description: Amazon to layoff over 18,000 employees, had fired 10,000 in November 2022 "

item.title: Dead body of a girl found on the Eastern Peripheral Highway in Greater Noida, her head crushed, probe initiated
item.description: Dead body of a girl found on the Eastern Peripheral Highway in Greater Noida, her head crushed, probe initiated Initial probe suggests that the girl's head was smashed to conceal her identity.

item.title: Banda: Jahila Begum sets honey traps for men to extort Rs 40-50 lakhs, had forced one businessman Shailesh to commit suicide, arrested
item.description: Banda: Jahila Begum sets honey traps for men to extort Rs 40-50 lakhs, had forced one businessman Shailesh to commit suicide, arrested Jahila Begum, a middle-aged woman who honey-trapped people, was caught and detained by Banda police.

item.title: As global media reports ring alarm over rising Covid cases in China, Global Times, the CCP mouthpiece says ‘all is well’
item.description: As global media reports ring alarm over rising Covid cases in China, Global Times, the CCP mouthpiece says ‘all is well’ The World Health Organisation (WHO) on December 22 expressed concerns over the unprecedented wave of Covid cases in China and asked it to accelerate vaccination of the most vulnerable.

item.title: Ghaziabad: 19-year-old hangs herself after Irfan shares her intimate videos online
item.description: Ghaziabad: 19-year-old hangs herself after Irfan shares her intimate videos online The accused and his family members are absconding since the suicide.

item.title: New CCTV footage from Tihar shows Satyendar Jain having lavish meal, fresh-cut salad, fruits; jail authorities say he has gained 8 kgs weight
item.description: New CCTV footage from Tihar shows Satyendar Jain having lavish meal, fresh-cut salad, fruits; jail authorities say he has gained 8 kgs weight Earlier it was revealed that the person giving massage to Jain in leaked video was child rape accused.

item.title: Vasai interfaith marriage: The couple’s parents confirm a limited ceremony following a death in family, deny rumours of cancellation over any tweet
item.description: Vasai interfaith marriage: The couple’s parents confirm a limited ceremony following a death in family, deny rumours of cancellation over any tweet Divya Dudhrejiya and Imran Mukadam got married in Vasai.

item.title: Chandigarh: Panjab University Student arrested on suspicion of terror links, was receiving funds from ISI agents
item.description: Chandigarh: Panjab University Student arrested on suspicion of terror links, was receiving funds from ISI agents Panjab University student Arshdeep has been arrested on suspicion of terror financing

item.title: After attacking Adani and Ambani ad nauseam, Alt News’ out-on-bail Mohammed Zubair begs Elon Musk to invest in Indian media
item.description: After attacking Adani and Ambani ad nauseam, Alt News’ out-on-bail Mohammed Zubair begs Elon Musk to invest in Indian media Alt News co-founder Mohammed Zubair recently asked Twitter CEO Elon Musk to invest in Indian media.

item.title: Assam: Executive Magistrate, SP, other cops and govt doctors arrested for protecting accused in rape and murder of a minor girl
item.description: Assam: Executive Magistrate, SP, other cops and govt doctors arrested for protecting accused in rape and murder of a minor girl Senior govt officials arrested in Assam after they tried protect a rape and murder accused in exchange for money by terming it a suicide case
